item.title: How Telarus GeoScan Finds Better Network Deals
item.description:
Telarus, a leading telecom brokerage service, introduces GeoScan, an innovative telecom carrier research tool, to enhance its suite of software-based services. This new tool allows Telarus consultants to refine carrier service offerings for clients through a more efficient search and evaluation process. By pinpointing the closest matching offers, Telarus agents can better serve their client’s specific needs. GeoScan addresses the need to manage a rapidly expanding pool of carrier options. Telarus’ existing GeoQuote process, known for finding and organizing services from various carriers, faced a welcome challenge: increased carrier participation and a transforming telecom landscape...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/how-telarus-geoscan-finds-better-network-deals/
